data.text: Eka Elihu nowacho kama:
“Winjuru wechena, un joma riek;
Nikech it temo weche
Wayieruru kendwa gima nikare;
“Ayub wacho ni, ‘Aonge ketho,
Kata obedo ni an kare,
To en ngʼa machalo gi Ayub;
En e achiel gi joma timbegi richo;
Nikech osebedo kowacho ni, ‘Onge ohala ma dhano yudo,
“Omiyo lingʼuru uwinja, un joma nigi winjo.
Ochulo dhano kaluwore gi timbene
En gima kwero mondo Nyasaye otim gima ok owinjore;
En ngʼa mane okete jarit piny?
Ka dabed ni Nyasaye
to ji duto ditho dichiel
“Ka un gi winjo adier to winjuru wachni;
Ngʼama ochayo adiera bende nyalo rito loch adier?
Donge Nyasaye ema wacho ne ruodhi ni, ‘Un joma nono,’
Nyasaye ok odewo kata mana wangʼ ruodhi
Joma roteke tho apoya e dier otieno;
“Wangʼe osiko karango timbe ji;
Onge kama otimo mudho
Onge gima ochuno ni Nyasaye nyaka non dhano amingʼa
Oketho telo mar joma roteke ma ok oyalogi
Nikech ongʼeyo timbegi
Okumo joricho e lela
nikech negilokore giweyo luwe
Negimiyo ywak joma odhier ochopo malo e nyime,
Kata ka nenore ni olingʼ, to en ngʼa ma dingʼadne bura?
mondo kik gibed e bwo loch ngʼat mokia Nyasaye,
“Ka dipo ngʼato nyalo wachone Nyasaye ni,
Puonja mondo ane gik mopondona;
Ere kaka idwaro ni Nyasaye otimni maber,
“Joma nigi winjo nyiso pachgi
‘Ayub osewuoyo maonge rieko;
Yaye, mad med ameda temo Ayub nyaka giko
Omedo dhi nyime gi timo richo
